CustomField.formula:
CASE(RecordType.DeveloperName, "Convsta_Validation_d_experience" , (IF( AND (INCLUDES($User.Programme_de_predilection__c, 'PGE'), ISPICKVAL (Convsta_Table_des_Regles_Experience_Pro__r.Programme__c,'PGE')), 15, 0 ) +
IF( AND (INCLUDES($User.Programme_de_predilection__c, 'ETD'), ISPICKVAL (Convsta_Table_des_Regles_Experience_Pro__r.Programme__c,'ETD')), 15, 0) +
IF( AND (INCLUDES($User.Programme_de_predilection__c, 'LMM'), ISPICKVAL (Convsta_Table_des_Regles_Experience_Pro__r.Programme__c,'LMM')), 15, 0) +
IF( AND (INCLUDES($User.Programme_de_predilection__c, 'BBA'), ISPICKVAL (Convsta_Table_des_Regles_Experience_Pro__r.Programme__c,'BBA')), 15, 0) +
IF( AND (INCLUDES($User.Programme_de_predilection__c, 'MS'), ISPICKVAL (Convsta_Table_des_Regles_Experience_Pro__r.Programme__c,'MS')), 15, 0)), 0)
CustomField.label: Score Comp√©tence
